ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What does this mean????
ygData.msgSnippet: if it is a screaming mace (yes, they are still out there....  my cleric has one, as does my shaman)  it starts proc ing at either 10 or 12... ... From: Rob
ygData.messageBody:
if it is a screaming mace (yes, they are still out there....  my cleric has one, as does my shaman)  it starts proc'ing at either 10 or 12...
----- Original Message -----
From: Rob LeBeau
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2002 3:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] What does this mean????

Yes,  it means the weap you have is a proc'ng weapon.
The ones I know of don't proc until level 25.

So keep it if you like but in your teens you will want
something that can hit for the middle 20's or better,
if you can find one reasonable.

Hope this helps


--- "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@...>
wrote:
> Hi again everyone!
>
>       Yesterday I was playing Genmay, my Gnome Warrior
> and I'm using a
> mace as my weapon. I kept getting a message saying
> something like my
> will isn't right to command this weapon. What does
> that mean? That I'm
> not able to use it or more specifically my class
> doesn't wield this
> weapon as well as others? Heck I seemed to be
> kicking some butt with it
> as my hits were ranking between 12-16 points each.
> Any ideas?
>
>
